description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹流體機械設計上之相關理論與其流場行為的分析方法，內容包括流體機械的熱流動力學、翼列間流場理論、軸流式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機)設計與分析、離心式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機) 設計與分析、渦卷式和螺旋式壓縮機設計與分析、電腦輔助流體機械設計。
description.en: This course intends to introduction the design principles of turbomachinery and the methods to analyze the flow behavior. The course contents are: thermo-fluid dynamics aspects of turbomachinery, cascade flow, preliminary design and analysis of xial-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fan), centrifugal-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fans), scroll and screw compressor, the computational aided design of turbomechinery.

description.zh: 教學目標融合本系之特色，強化學生在熱流學領域上之智識與能力，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。課程簡介1.	流體的輸送特性與熱力特性簡介2.	流體流動之基本定律3.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流4.	低溫系統之介紹5.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，6.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，7.	強迫對流分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳8.	自然對流分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流熱傳9.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰
description.en: Thermal Sciences for Cryogenics  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Introduction of fluid transport and thermodynamic properties2.	Basic laws of fluid flow3.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts4.	Introduction to cryogenic systems5.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat conduction analysis6.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat conduction analysis7.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and laminar heat transfer in ducts8.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 9.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一, 共同科館302教室

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.en: Field Test Environment Management and Safety

description.zh: 探討技職學校實習工場規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等管理事項，以及實習工場安全防護設施與措施，以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: Exploring the best practice of management and safety for field test environment is the purpose of this course.

name.en: Guidance for Vocational and Technical Schools’ Students

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討當代輔導理論、技職教育學生特質，以及各種重要之學生問題如生涯規劃、職業輔導等輔導的原理與方法。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the theories and practice of Counseling for vocational and technical school students. The contents conclude the principles of counseling, characters of students, and the various techniques of counseling.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 研一廖老師  研二蔡老師

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

name.zh: 建築生命周期管理特論

description.zh: 本課程主要探討整體建築生命周期(從企劃、設計、施工、使用維護、改建、解體再利用等)之管理科學的理論以及實際管理的操作手法。授課內容如下面內容所示:專題討論內容     ■ 專案管理的基本概念與思想、建築專案的諸管理活動■ 建築物的生命週期管理(LCM)與經濟性■ 建築專案環境計畫的理論與實績(EMS)■ 建築專案之營運與設施管理計畫(FM)■ 建築專案的renovation管理手法 (RM)■ 建築部品及組件的物流與供應鏈管理(SCM)■ 建築相關知科技整合(Technology fusion)與技術管理科學(MOT)■ 建築專案管理的整合與課題
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the complete theories of the management of building projects, regarding whole achitectural lifecycle(from planning, design, construction, maintenance, re-construction, to dismantling and material reusage), and its actual implementation methods. Its contents include fundamental concepts and ideas in Project Management, the rating modes and case studies of LifeCycle Management, and introduction to the Management of Technology & Technology Fusion concept that has become widely popular among foreign academics. The scoring for this curriculum will be based upon either two hand-in reports or open-book exams.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

notes: 管理組/產學合作中心201教室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 許多的物理系統，從生物系統(人體模型)、機械結構(機器人)到柔性結構(人造衛星系統)等均可模擬成多體之機械系統。本課程將以Euler-Lagrange methodology and Kane's Equations來建立此機械系統的模型，並探討如何分析及設計其特徵及穩定性。另外，本課程將介紹目前研究多體機械系統中最常用之套裝軟體，並讓學生使用其中一種作專題實例的應用。
description.en: An increasing number of physical systems, ranging from bio-systems (human-body models) to mechanisms (robots) to flexible structures (satellite booms), are being modeled as a multi-body mechanical systems.  This course is trying to use Euler-Lagrange methodology and Kane's Equations to build up these mechanical system models.  And to investigate how to design and analysis the characteristic and stability of them.  Also, the course will introduce the most popular multi-body mechanical systems program packets and the students need to use one of these packages to solve an engineering project.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，組織與管理之重要理論，未來發展趨勢及理論與實務之配合技巧等。課程主要目的為：、啟迪管理哲學和觀念、以分組個案研討方式加強分析、解決問題及決策的能力，、以口頭報告來訓練表達和溝通能力，、訓練對企畫案及其他書面報告之寫作技巧，、塑造管理人員應具備的信念、特質、意志及工作倫理。
description.en: The course is to make the studendts realize :1.the progress of management,2.the important theories and the future,3.the applications technique,The objects of this course:1.realize the philosophy of management,2.emphasize the analysis ability of case studies,3.emphasize the problem-solving and decision-making abilities,4.the abilities of presentation and communication with oracle report,5.the abilities of project-writing,6.the abilities of a management manager supported to be,including belief,characters,wills and the working manners .

description.zh: 本課程內容為：工業心理的意義、發展、研究、功能及範圍。員工的態度、士氣、參與、溝通障礙之處理。市場研究、領導行為。管理心理旨在探討組織中人與事的問題；從對人員的動機、認知、學習、態度等得個別行動差異之研究，到團體行為與效能之探討，藉以促進組織發展，提昇管理績效。探討之內容包括：態度、工作滿足、性格、知覺、激勵、學習、領導、溝通、權力、衝突、組織文化、組織結構、團體動力學等。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed: overview of industrial psychology, including personnel psychology, engineering psychology, consumer psychology.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程針對電腦初學者所設計，課程依照初學者最需要的電腦入門知識和技能，從基本的網路原理及、網路資源教起，讓同學可以充份掌握並利用並利用網路資源。本課程亦教授網頁編輯觀念教您如何規劃網站架構、再加上互動式表單及動態網頁效果的完整說明,讓同學也能製作出具有專業水準的網站。本課程分為「電腦基礎」和「網際網路」等二部份：(1) 電腦基礎篇：介紹最熱門的網路觀念與操作技巧，內容涵括知識性的網路相關知識，包括網路與Internet發展，以及資訊安全等題材；另外還有操作性的課題，包括WWW與網路搜尋、E-mail電子郵件、HTML網頁製作、FTP檔案傳輸與網站發佈等；學會上網找資料、收發電子郵件、使用即時通訊軟體。(2) 網際網路篇：學會製作個人網頁等技巧。製作網頁以FrontPage中文版的各項基本功能為主，內容包括網站的建立、圖文網頁編輯、表格與超連結、導覽列與共用邊框、分割框架與多媒體互動網頁設計，以及網站的發佈與管理等，讓同學可以完整學習利用FrontPage來編製網頁的編輯技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for the students who want to handle the resource of internet. The is course composed of two parts:（1）The concept of internet and the application program（2）Learning how to build up the website by using Microsoft FrontPage.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程分二年（四學期）教授，在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 講解建築計畫的基本精神、方法及各種類型建築的案例分析其授課主題為：一、建築計畫之基本精神：1.計劃和生活、生產的關係、2.建築計畫之定位；二、建築計畫之方法：1.建築之定性、2.計畫之調查、分析、3.尺寸與規模計畫、4.空間與構造計畫；三、案例分析。
description.en: Introduce the basic philosophy & method of architecture planning. Case studies ofdifferent building types. The topic include：1、	the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living l	the scope of architecture planning 2、	the method of architecture planningl	the quality of architecturel	the investigation & analysis of planningl	size & scale planningl	space & construction planning 3、	case study

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

description.zh: 一、教學目標： 簡介綠建築、永續都市之各項子議題，現階段專業界對本課題之解決概念及手法，並引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。二、教學內容：1.思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。2.綠建築、永續都市之內容。3. 引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the green buildings and sustainable cities. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 本課程在培養學生具備在建築專業設計時輔助其執行外部環境塑造的基本能力與認知。主要教學內容包括：一、景觀建築之基礎專業概說與相關範疇之界定：1.景觀建築專業之界定、範疇、演變、2.景觀建築之相關範疇之界定生態學、園藝學；二、景觀建築之人文背景：1.景觀建築之風格演變、2.景觀建築之人文因子概說；三、景觀建築之研究方法與內涵：1.景觀建築之定性研究方法解析、2.景觀建築之定量研究方法解析。
description.en: The course aims at the training of undertaking design for outdoor environment within architectural discipline. Contents of the course mainly includes:1.	Definition of landscape architecture and the relevant categories.1)	Definition, realm, and development in landscape profession2)	Defining relevant disciplines such as horticulture, ecology, and architecture. 2.	Human aspects  1)	The transformation of landscape modes and styles2)	Human factors 3.	Landscape Research Methods 1)	Qualitative Research in landscape 2)	Quantitative Research in landscape

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。
description.en: Text, image, audio, video are common used to transmit information now. How to organize and represent these different kinds of data became an important issue. This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述應用統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含資料蒐集與描述、機率論、抽樣方法與抽樣分配、假設檢定、變異數分析、迴歸與相關分析。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics and its application is to give an introduction of descriptive statistics, probability, and inductive statistics. They include data collection and description, probability, sampling methods and sampling distribution, hypothesis testing, ANOVA, regression and correlation analysis.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of soving related problems.The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics:linear programming , network analysis , dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory,non-linear programming , markevo chain,,wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliabity,decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
description.en: The course is to make the students realize :1. The progress of management,2. The theories of management,  3. The future of management.The topics of this course:1. Organization and management.2. Philosophies of management.3. The function of management.4. Communication.5. The future of management.6. Case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業（工業）相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1. The characters of business laws. 2. The presentment of civil code. 3. The business registration laws and business laws. 4. The insurance laws.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解管理會計的技巧與成本管理的觀念。在介紹過營收報表、損益平衡表、現金流動表後，本課程將探討資產管理、資金結構、資金運轉、創投資金、股息策略、利潤分析等議題。課程中亦將論及利用這些財務數據做為決策根據的作法。
description.en: This course teaches students the conceptual understanding of managerial accounting skills and cost management. After the introduction of income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement, this course will examine the topics that include asset management, capital structure, capital budgeting, venture capital, dividend policy, profit analysis, etc. The use of these financial data towards decision-making will be evaluated and discussed.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

notes: 教室科研440上課時間(五)A.B.C節

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

notes: 教室科研440上課時間(二)A.B.C節

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

notes: 教室科研440上課時間(六)8.9.A節

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新" 研發流程管理以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，研發與管理思維更要突破創新，以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。創新研發管理課程;以詳細介紹產品與服務研發流程與組織架構、產品與服務策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、產品與服務規格定義與確認、產品與服務概念開發與測試、品質與目標成本設計、產品研發流程之突破創新機會點(前端預防設計)、解決問題之創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)等主題。瞭解TRIZ如何應用於系統化創新構思並解?矛盾問題，快速激發最可能解?指定問題之TRIZ創新原則與指導方向，解?之問題包含工程與管理策略亦適用，TRIZ管理實務案例包含研發管理、生產管理、服務業管理、專案管理。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in an innovative thinking manner for product R&D management process, including product planning, concept development, system design, detail design, testing and refinement, and ramp-up production. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 12 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, project management, service industry management, and production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students involving creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

notes: 教室科研440上課時間(一)A.B.C節

description.zh: 本課程期透過建立學生正確的研究觀念，以培養論文研究與寫作之基礎能力。根據論文寫作方法之需求，分別從建立正確的研究態度、質性研究、探索性研究設計、研究個案探討、論文格式及研究程序加以研討，讓學生了解研究方法的本質、研究的意義、過程與方法，以及研究設計的基本概念與特性；進而瞭解如何進行質性與量化研究、資料蒐集、資料處理與統計分析，並管理研究的設計與執行程序。此外，藉由本課程促使學生能應用各種不同的統計方法及統計軟體以分析商管領域等相關資料，學習撰寫研究論文並準備口頭報告，以培養商業管理研究論文之撰寫、闡釋、解讀並評析各式研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objectives of this course are：1. To introduce the basic concept of research methodology that applies in academic and practical research. 2. To learn the methods of conducting research processes, designing research strategies, collecting and analyzing research data, and preparing research proposals and reports. 3. To know how to obtain the required information through appropriate approaches in writing research papers and solving management problems.

notes: 教室科研823上課時間(三)A.B.C節

description.zh: 課程主要內容如下; 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境scan 2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理(1)--(8) 12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理(1)-(2)
description.en: The main content of this course include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10.The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11.Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company. 12.Case study of a famous successful new-factional enterprise.

notes: 教室科研823上課時間(四)A.B.C節

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

notes: 限研二_教室科研823上課時間(二)A.B.C節

description.zh: 本課程主要研討科技管理，內容包括：（1）導論（2）技術資源與能力（3）技術創新（4）技術策略（5）科技規劃（6）績效評估（7）科技發展倫理（8）智慧財產權。
description.en: The course mainly discusses following topics：（1）introduction, （2）technological resource and capability, （3）technological innovation,（4）strategy of technology（5）technology planning, （6）measuring performance, （7）technology development ethics, （8）intellectual property rights.

notes: 教室科研823上課時間(五)A.B.C節

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

description.zh: 此課程之重心著重在於新世代的「人機互動技術」（Human-Machine Interaction），是希望能從人的觀點來看，使人可以用更自然人性的方式來操作機器設備；從機器的觀點來看，則是使機器可以具有類似人類的感知與表達能力。技術面則將以擴增實境(Augmented Reality)作為學習與應用的主軸，案例部分將融合博物館、商業行銷活動，甚至是數位學習教材，體驗各產業在融入擴增實境之後，都可以呈現出截然不同的獨特經驗。
description.en: This course focuses on the technique of Human-Machine Interaction (HMI), hoping that students can see not just from human's side, but from machine's. From human's side, HMI is aimed at letting people operate machine in more human-based way; from machine's side, HMI is aimed at making machine possess the perception ability and expression which is similar to human's. From technical aspect, this course will use the Augmented Reality to be the main learning. Besides, this course explores case studies to museum, business marketing and digital learning, which will give students a unique experience.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於藉由創意思考的原則、方法與工具，輔以實務上個案的研討與引導，培養學生具備創意思考的能力。課程單元包含問題解決能力與觀念、創意思考的觀點與論述、心智圖的運用與整合、創意生成具體方法、策略評估與分析等，各單元將採用理論講解與個案分組研討的方式進行，輔以作業以啟發學生的創造力及革新精神，並能實際應用於實務案例之中。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' ability on creative thinking, through the introduction of guidelines, methods and tools of creative thinking, and the discussion of relative case studies. Course topics include problem-solving, theory of creative thinking, application of mind mapping, methods, strategies evaluation and analysis. Lecturing, group discussion and assignment are incorporated in the course to enhance students' understanding and practical application on creativity and creation.

description.zh: 近年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
description.en: The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.

description.zh: 無線射頻辨識(RFID)是一種藉由無線電波傳遞之非接觸式自動辨識技術。相關的應用包括了如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和生產自動化等。RFID系統的主要組成，包括了標籤、讀取器與後端應用系統等三個部分。本課程首先介紹RFID系統運作之基本原理及產業應用；接著針對RFID系統驗測相關技術進行說明，並針對RFID應用系統之開發進行實作。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a contactless technology that uses radio waves to automatically identify individual items. A RFID system composes three major portions: tag, interrogator, and backend application system. In this course, the basic technology of RFID system operations and its application are introduced. In addition, technologies for system development and verification of RFID application system are also illustrated.

description.zh: 互動科技與遍佈運算技術促使建築空間成為整合媒體資訊中介界面。課程目標在利用數位資訊科技以設計使用者為中心、服務導向、敏感回應與協調的居住環境，促使學習者多重思考未來居住空間之規劃設計可能性，與掌握相關技術。教學除專業課程論述，產、官、學研究性、實務利用性的專業講題、個案研討，並協調建築研究所進行產學訓協同教學。以報告作品小組討論為評量方式。
description.en: Interaction technology and ubiquitous computing reform architectural space to an integrated media-information interface. The course objectives are to promote students of planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, coordination works with ABRI, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹互動媒體設計與產品中所需要的設計的基本思及組成元素(例如：文字、影像、圖形及動帶影像等)。學生將透過理論的認知、案例探討及完整的實例練習的方式去了解互動媒體設計中所需要之數位繪圖中之圖像版面設計、圖像視覺溝通創意與概念、互動設計中的圖像元素製作、資料格式、以及數位媒體資訊應用設計的基本方法。本課程的主要目標在於教導學生透過分析、評估、設計與創造互動媒體設計所需的圖像。
description.en: This course will explore the fundamentals considerations of design composition (text, image, graphics, motion) and production for digital media in interactive media design. Students conduct studies and complete case exercises in design and layout for the graph; visual communication of ideas and concepts in a non-textual context; graphic elements for interactive media design; file formats; and digital media considerations and information flow/sequencing and design. The major objective of this course is to teach students how to analyze, evaluate, design and create the digital graph for interactive media design.

description.zh: 前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為

description.zh: 「電化冶金」乃是一門探討如何利用電化學原理從事冶金工作之研究，任何電化學反應之進行都必須有陽極、陰極、電解液（質）之存在方能發生，缺一不可，了解陽極之氧化反應，陰極之還原反應，陰陽極各界面之行為，與電解質之導電度行為，實為進入電化學領域之不二法門，再以電化學方面之知識基礎，應用在金屬之濕法冶鍊，金屬之防蝕等材料工程上，期能精鍊更高純度之金屬，保固金屬並延長使用壽命。本課程包括：介紹一連串電化學理論為基礎，從而由淺入深地應用到冶金及材料科學上以期使學生學習到實際的電化學應用、實務與理論配合。學生須先具備分析化學及物理化學的知識。由表面性質的決定，談到界面電化學，及界面電荷傳導，及分佈的電性質理論，來決定溶液中化學反應發生的模式.
description.en: Electrochemical metallurgy is a course to study how to utilize electrochemistry todo the research of metallurgy, any electrochemical reaction should be done at theexistence of anode, cathode and electrolyte, therefore, to understand the oxidation reaction of anode, the reduction reaction of cathode, their interface behaviors,and the conductivity behavior of electrolyte, are the only way to enter electrochemical`territory. Further, using the basic knowledge of electrochemistry to apply at the wet process smelting and anticorrosion of metal, in order to expect a higher degree ofpurity, protection and longetivity. From introduction to a series of fundamental electrochemical theory to applying metallurgy and material science step by step,the course let students learn practically applied electrochemistry,matching practice with theory.Students should be owning the knowledgeof analytical chemistry and physic chemistry.They shall determine the surface property, surface electrochemist

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意．肇事之形成因素，重建之定義及過程，數學物理及動力學應用於肇事重建，了解車輛碰撞行為，肇事之理解認知及反應，肇事之動量功能原理應用．車速估算．及轉向過度修正，轎車．機車．行人．及卡車肇事重建．

Physics and Dynamics in Traffic Accident Reconstruction., Understanding Vehicle Collision Behavior, Perception & Reaction in Traffic Accident, Principle of Momnetum、 Work and Energy、 Speed Estimates for Vehicle, Steering Over-correction in Traffic Accident, Vehicle-Pedestrian, Motorcycle and Heavy Truck Traffic Accident Reconstruction。

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 本課程目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager. Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程:物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。

Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
邊坡破壞之型態、分類、誘因與力學行為之探討，邊坡穩定分析之方法與理論，邊坡穩定處理對策略與防治方法之探討，邊坡滑動地層之監測、鑽探取樣與試驗分析。
description.en: This course covers various methods of slope stability analyses; selection of methods of analysis and strength parameters;field investigation for landslide problems; design strategies; landslip preventive and protective measures; and slope monitoring systems.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to: 1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems,an examine their economic and technical characteristics. 2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator PV systems, and discuss their operation. 3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show its feasibility and future potential.

Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step.Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet.1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

notes: 限研二_教室科研723上課時間(三)A.B.C節

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本課程介紹產品介面設計之系統性實務。產品介面設計面臨使用者多樣化與介面日趨複雜的挑戰，設計者必須憑藉精確的方法才能掌握設計的易用性。各種方法包括：使用者需求探討、使用性分析、解決方案評估、實驗模型製作、使用者測試等。其中使用性測試係模擬介面與使用情境，藉由觀察與記錄挖掘操作過程之經驗，其中包括操作錯誤、使用疑惑、使用挫折、使用效率與使用滿意度。本課程將介紹上述各種方法及理論，並以案例引導學習者思考與操作。
description.en: This course is to introduce a practical and systematic way to deliver a product that works for users. It is a methodical approach involves several methods, including gathering requirements, analyzing usability problems, evaluating design alternatives, proposing solutions, developing and testing prototypes, and testing a interface with users. The goal of usability testing is to uncover problems that users may encounter so those problems can be fixed. Testing may include collecting data on the paths users take to do tasks, the errors they make, when and where they are confused or frustrated, how fast they do a task, whether they succeed in doing the task, and how satisfied they are with the experience. Case studies and practice will be carried out with illustration and discussions.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過產品之分析，探討設計者、使用者與產品三者間訊息傳達之模式，藉由相關理論之探討與個案研究，培養學生對設計傳達理論之應用與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the analyze of product to explore the communicated mode in designer, user and product. By the exploration of related theory and case study, it trains the students the application of design communication and the ability of analytic method.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項新能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of new energy system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

description.zh: 本課程探討運用物件導向技術開發軟體系統的過程與步驟，透過課程資訊系統專題製作，學習者將練習以UML分析與設計軟體系統，並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向概念與模型語言 - UML介紹。2. 物件導向程式語言與環境介紹。3. 物件導向軟體開發生命週期，包括3.1物件導向需求分析 - 使用案例模型和活動圖，3.2物件導向設計 - 循序圖、類別圖、元件圖、部署圖、設計樣式，3.3 物件導向程式設計 - 設計與程式撰寫之應對。4. 專題製作。
description.en: English DescriptionThis course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML, 2. Object-oriented languages and environments, 3. Object-oriented software development process: 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, activity diagram, 3.2 Object-oriented design – sequence diagram, class diagrams, component diagram, deployment diagram, design patterns, 3.3 Construction - mapping design to object-oriented codes, 4. Term project.
